txt.en: The Mordor Orcs have suffered great casualties from the attacks of the Moria Orcs. The heart of their forces is weakened and vulnerable.

'The Orcs of Mordor are weakened, [placeholder]! Their lines are straining, and their numbers are falling quickly. Now is the time to strike at their heart. Infiltrate their camp, defeating any in your path, and slay the captains. Once their leadership falls, the organization of the Orcs will vanish, and their army will crumble.\n\n'The Mordor Orcs make camp at Baiúrz-mur, north of here. Go forth with the blessing of Durin's Folk!'
'Without the leadership of their captains, the Orcs of Mordor are beginning to waver and break. There is still one last thing to be done, and this will prove to the hardest task of all.'
The Orcs of Mordor and their captains are encamped at Baiúrz-mur, north of the Orc-watch.\n\nKnakk told you to press an assault against the Orcs of Mordor and their captains.
Knakk is at the Orc-watch, south of Baiúrz-mur.\n\nKnakk will be pleased to hear that the captains of Mordor and many of their troops have been routed from Baiúrz-mur and defeated.
'They are near the edge and need but a slight shove to topple them down the cliff.'
Talk to Knakk at the Orc-watch
